name: Achievement Hunter: Zombie 2
description:
Achievement Hunter: Zombie 2

In this 2d action / shooter you will play for the main character who wants again to stop the alien who are trying to destroy his home.
You do not have any allies. There are only you, your weapons and a huge number of aliens.
Fight for your home, increase your skill, upgrade weapons and prevent invasion of aliens into your city.

Game features:
- 5000 ACHIEVEMENTS
- Minimum allowable price
- Real weapons
- Fearless protagonist
